overview: “Set in the late seventies in Halifax, Nova Scotia, MACGUFFIN 8-2975 is a text-based narrative that expresses a story of intrigue and suspicion. […] In the ﬁlm industry, the MacGufﬁn is a term used to indicate a plot device. The protagonists come together to pursue a common goal, an object, or other stimulus that has no clear explanation. Knight’s ﬁlm is an exemplary MacGufﬁn.” –PLUG IN INSTITUTE OF CONTEMPORARY ART
title: MacGuffin 8-2975
